      Class that represents a Microsoft Band barcode layout element

      Methods in com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages with parameters of type PageElement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T PagePanel.addElements(PageElement... elements)
      Method to add layout element children to this container layout

      NOTE: When non-panel elements overlap, The Z-order of the elements are opposite of the order in which they are inserted.
